definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Da4 Bai3 ke1 Quan2 shu1 Chu1 ban3 she4

sentences.english: What publications will be published during the Guangzhou Asian Games?
sentences.chinese: 广州亚运会赛时官方出版物计划有哪些？

sentences.english: Yang is still looking for a book publisher.
sentences.chinese: 目前，杨雅晴仍在寻找书的出版商。

sentences.english: We used a funnel plot to evaluate reports for publication bias.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用倒漏斗图形对出版偏倚的报道进行评价。

sentences.english: The paper published an extra to announce the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 那家报纸出版号外宣布战争结束的消息。

sentences.english: Carmack said Id turned down many offers from large publishers over the years.
sentences.chinese: 卡马克说号拒绝了许多优惠大出版商多年来。

sentences.english: The score has also been published by the Chinese Christian Literture Council Ltd. , HK. , 2005. …
sentences.chinese: 乐谱亦已于2005年由香港基督教文艺出版社出版。

sentences.english: The score has also been published by the Chinese Christian Literture Council Ltd. , HK. , 2005. …
sentences.chinese: 乐谱亦已于2005年由香港基督教文艺出版社出版。

sentences.english: Self-publishing these days is increasingly a tale of two cities.
sentences.chinese: 今自助出版越来越呈现两极分化的趋势。

sentences.english: To remember terms on aids to navigation and nautical publication.
sentences.chinese: 有关助航仪器和航海出版物的术语。

sentences.english: Thee-publishing which cannot murder the tradition publishing businesses.
sentences.chinese: 电子出版不能谋杀的传统出版业务。

sentences.english: Thee-publishing which cannot murder the tradition publishing businesses.
sentences.chinese: 电子出版不能谋杀的传统出版业务。

sentences.english: We will not be publishing many clueless user stories about them in the future.
sentences.chinese: 将来我们不再能出版很多《无知用户的故事》了。

sentences.english: If your ideas have merit, sooner or later someone will publish them.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的想法有价值，迟早有人会出版它们的。

sentences.english: The storefront will aim to simplify the process, in order to attract publishers.
sentences.chinese: 这个商店将努力使得流程简化以吸引出版商参与。

to send (a manuscript) to the press
